snippet: While a decision to move President Obama's speech at the Democratic National Convention to a smaller venue might have left some volunteers and visitors here feeling left out in the cold - or the rain, as the weather forecast was predicting - many...
abstract: While a decision to move President Obama's speech at the Democratic National Convention to a smaller venue might have left some volunteers and visitors here feeling left out in the cold - or the rain, as the weather forecast was predicting - many took it in stride, their support for the President undiminished.

byline.original: By ANDREW SIDDONS and ISABELLA MOSCHEN

headline.main: Reaction to Change of Venue for Obama's Speech
